body:
According to the documentation, you can remove a mirror like this:

```
$ spack mirror remove -h
usage: spack mirror remove [-h] name

positional arguments:
  name

optional arguments:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit
```

However:

```
$ spack mirror remove cmake
==> Error: Unknown scope None.  Valid options are site, user
```
title: Cannot remove a mirror
